components.description:
A yellow face with its right hand saluting. Used as a sign of respect.

The expression of the face of this emoji can vary across platforms, with some designs featuring a neutral face while others are shown smiling to various degrees. 

Apple and Huewai's designs notably only display half a face, likely to make the saluting hand more prominent when this emoji is viewed in smaller sizes.

This emoji went viral across Twitter in late 2022 following the news that the platform would be dramatically reducing its staff numbers as part of a company-wide restructuring following its acquisition by Elon Musk. Learn more here.
components.title: Saluting Face

title: Saluting Face

version.description:
Unicode 14.0 is the version of the Unicode Standard released on September 14, 2021. 37 new emoji code points were added in this release, with all 112 new emojis (including sequences for skin tones) listed under Emoji 14.0.

New emojis added in this release are update expected to come to major platforms in either late 2021 or early 2022.

This release of this Unicode Standard was delayed from March 2021 due to COVID-19. 

  • üìù Unicode 14.0 details on Unicode.org

apple_vendor_description: This saluting face emoji on Apple devices features a smiling face with a crisp, upward salute, conveying respect and acknowledgement with a friendly demeanor. Apple's characteristic smooth gradients and rounded edges bring a cheerful, optimistic tone to the expression. It‚Äôs a modern and polite way to signal agreement, gratitude, or a formal greeting in digital conversations.
